import { isUserLoggedIn } from '@Utils' import { useSkin } from '@Hooks/useSkin' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup'; import Service from "../../../helper/request"; import { getHomeRouteForLoggedInUser, isObjEmpty } from "@Utils"; import classnames from "classnames"; import { ChevronLeft } from 'react-feather' import { Link, Redirect, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap' import '@Styles/base/pages/page-auth.scss' import * as yup from "yup"; import { SCHEMA_FORGOT_PASSWORD } from '@Constants/constValidate' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import api from '@Constants/api'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; const schema = yup.object(SCHEMA_FORGOT_PASSWORD).required(); const ForgotPassword = () => { const [skin, setSkin] = useSkin() const { register, handleSubmit, formState:{ errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema), mode:"all", }); const history = useHistory() const illustration = skin === 'dark' ? 'forgot-password-v2-dark.svg' : 'forgot-password-v2.svg', source = require(`@Assets/images/pages/${illustration}`).default const onSubmit = (data) => { if (isObjEmpty(errors)) { Service.send({ method: api.EMPLOYEE_RESET_PASSWORD.method, path: api.EMPLOYEE_RESET_PASSWORD.path, data }).then( (result) => { if (result) { const { status } = result; if (status === 200) { alert("gui mail thanh cong") history.pushState({ email:"bill2k2@gmail.com" }) history.push("/cms/form-reset-password") } else if(status==404){ toast.error("Email chưa được đăng kí"); } } } ); } }; if (!isUserLoggedIn()) { return (
e.preventDefault()}>
